Title: Alessia... un vulcano sotto la pelle
Actors: Karina Verlier, Mario Novelli, Ria De Simone
Plot: Alessia, a seventeen-year-old girl raised in a convent, just returned to the country house where she was born, finds cordiality from her uncle Nicola and a marked hostility from Aunt Agnese. Stimulated by the environment that saw ...
